string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Bridge - An architectural marvel spanning over the water, constructed in 2003.
City - A bustling metropolis with towering skyscrapers and vibrant culture, established in 2008.
Deer - A graceful creature often seen grazing in meadows and forests, captured in 2010.
Fog - A mysterious and ethereal weather phenomenon that blankets landscapes, observed in 2004.
Forest - A dense woodland filled with diverse flora and fauna, explored in 2006.
Harbour - A safe haven for ships and boats, providing shelter and trade opportunities, developed in 2012.
Jungle - A wild and untamed wilderness teeming with life, ventured into in 2015.
Library - A sanctuary of knowledge and learning, housing countless books and resources, founded in 2007.
Skyscraper - A towering structure that reaches towards the sky, symbolizing modern architectural achievements, built in 2018.
Windows - A glimpse into different worlds and perspectives, offering both views and light, installed in 2011.
